product_name: Nite Ize S-Biner Ahhh Bottle Opener
long_description: The Nite Ize S-Biner Ahhh Bottle Opener opens your favorite beverages and pulls double duty as a handy carabiner. S-Biner design features 2 gate closures-great for carrying keys, water bottles and camping gear. Both ends function as handy bottle openers. High-quality stainless steel offers durability and functionality.
short_description: The Nite Ize S-Biner Ahhh Bottle Opener opens your favorite beverages and pulls double duty as a handy carabiner.
